Think tables covered in white cloth, wood accents, and a buzzing, blue-tiled open kitchen.  From that kitchen the New Jersey native cooks up straightforward classics with a farm-to-table concept that will leave you feeling nostalgic for those Big Apple vibes.  Start with baked clams (B320) served with scallops, fennel, and a garlic gremolata or the spicy meatballs al forno (B220) with basil and Parmesan. There are plenty of wood-fired pizzas to choose from, too, like the Bangkok Hot (B520) topped with fennel salami, spicy n’duja, meatball, mozzarella, and pickled chilis.  Mains include comforting favorites like spaghetti and meatballs (B380), the made-to-share veal Parmigiana (B1,860), veal cutlets slathered in tomato sugo, buffalo mozzarella, and Parmesan, and roasted half baby chicken (B580) paired with garlic gnocchi, spinach, and lemon.  For the sweet tooth, there are dishes like the unique whiskey banana cake (B340) served with salted caramel and hazelnut gelato.  When the time comes to drink in restaurants again, rest assured there’s a well-curated list of wines, signature cocktails, and a selection of digestifs to choose from.  Images courtesy of Tony’s
summary: A vibrant Italian eatery, the restaurant showcases a buzzing open kitchen and classic red-sauce dishes. Specialties like wood-fired pizzas and comforting pasta evoke nostalgic New York vibes. With a curated wine list and unique desserts, it’s perfect for both casual meals and special occasions.
address: 27, 477 Soi Sukhumvit 11, Khwaeng Khlong Toei Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Rintaro (Ari)
description_full:
После своего первого филиала в Таиланде, который произвел фурор в Пхра-Кханонге, японская гелатерия Rintaro теперь открывает второй магазин в Ари. Основные моменты — это 18 вкусов сезонного мороженого, которые меняются ежедневно. Владелец Синтаро Накадима закупает ингредиенты у местных фермеров, чтобы создать такие вкусы, как какао из Чумпхона с карамельными орехами, мангостин из Чантабури и маракуйя из Чианграя. Другие изюминки включают яркое мороженое с юдзу и медом, а также японское соевое мороженое, посыпанное кинако (жареная соевая мука) и клейким, жевательным моти. За 120 бат можно выбрать комбинацию из двух вкусов с выбором рожка — кленового или какао, которые подаются горячими. Для тех, кто не может насытиться сладким, также есть возможность взять с собой (900 бат за 750 г). 

Адрес: Rintaro (Ari), Phahonyothin Soi 8, Bangkok, Thailand  
Часы работы: Вт-Вс 11:00-23:00
summary: A charming gelateria offers 18 seasonal ice cream flavors that change daily, crafted from locally sourced ingredients. Unique options include yuzu and honey, as well as Japanese soy ice cream topped with kinako and chewy mochi. Perfect for a sweet treat, combinations can be served in warm cones or taken to go.
address: 1595/521 ห้องที่ B04 สกาย วอล์ค คอนโดมิเนียม 01 Sukhumvit Rd, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Watthana, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10110, Thailand

name: Potion Essential
description_full: A recent fixture on the city’s health and wellness events scene, Potion Essential seeks to add superfood to your culinary vocabulary with its Sathorn cafe. The two-story space caters to cafe-hoppers with colorful accents that contrast the monochromatic setting—bold, bright plates of food, vibrant juices, quotes in purple neon tubing splashed against granite-gray flooring and all-white décor. But Potion Essential is more about food that makes you feel good than eye candy. Packed with macronutrient-rich ingredients like avocado, quinoa, and chickpeas, the menu offers hearty, healthy fare to fuel fast-paced and typically indulgent urban lifestyles. Savory favorites include the chicken quinoa salad (B240), spicy chickpea pumpkin salad (B240), and avocado, bacon, and chickpea toast with balsamic reduction (B280). If you prefer your toast as dessert, opt for the avocado cacao mousse with passionfruit (B240). There are a variety of refreshing, homemade juice options to wash it all down (B130/bottle), each a different “potion.” The red, for instance, combines watermelon, passionfruit, and tomato, while the yellow combines pineapple and celery. For dessert, there are sugar-free treats like banana muffins (macadamia, almond, or chocolate chip) drizzled with cocoa and made with soy milk (B80).      All images courtesy of Potion Essential
summary: A vibrant café in Sathorn, colorful accents brighten the minimalist decor while serving nutrient-rich dishes. Specialties include hearty salads and unique toast options, all designed to nourish a busy lifestyle. Freshly made juices complement the wholesome menu, offering refreshing choices for every palate.
address: 137 Soi Sathu Pradit 6, Khwaeng Thung Wat Don, Khet Sathon, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10120, Thailand
